summary: The contact owns a 2021 Ram 2500 used for hauling a 2021 Keystone Montana 295 RL. The contact received notification of NHTSA Campaign Number: 21V368000 (Equipment) however, the part to do the recall repair was not yet available. The contact stated that the manufacturer had exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair. The contact was informed that the technician would be available in a month and a half to perform the recall repair. The RV was not repaired. The contact had not experienced a failure. The manufacturer was notified of the failure however no further assistance was taken. Parts Distribution Disconnect.
